title: Finance Ministry adds four new navratnas
description: Finance minister Nirmala Sitharaman has given the navratna status to four more state-owned public enterprises - Satluj Jal Vidyut Nigam Ltd, Solar Energy Corporation of India Ltd, Railtel Corporation of India Ltd and National Hydroelectric Power Corporation Ltd.
content: (You can now subscribe to our Economic Times WhatsApp channel)
